column4: Hi. I am putting some life into pam-pgsql (a postgreql module for pam). I would like to know if there is any mainteiner that would like to maintain this package for fedora or test it.
Ubuntu syncs it from Debian's repositories, so 1) the MOTU team in #ubuntu-motu is responsible for it in Ubuntu, 2) you might want to find a Debian maintainer instead.
